AssignLeniPrivateIpAddress.title: AssignLeniPrivateIpAddress
AssignLeniPrivateIpAddress.summary: Apply for a secondary private IP address for the current Lingjun Elastic Network Interface. You can automatically assign a secondary private IP address.

AssignPrivateIpAddress.title: AssignPrivateIpAddress
AssignPrivateIpAddress.summary: Applies for a private secondary IP address for the current LNI. You can also call this operation to assign a secondary MAC address to the current LNI.

AssociateVpdCidrBlock.title: AssociateVpdCidrBlock
AssociateVpdCidrBlock.summary: When the VPD primary network segment address is not enough to allocate, you can choose to create an additional network segment as the additional network segment of the VPD primary network segment.

AttachElasticNetworkInterface.title: AttachElasticNetworkInterface
AttachElasticNetworkInterface.summary: Lingjun ENI is bound to NC.

CreateErRouteMap.title: CreateErRouteMap
CreateErRouteMap.summary: Users can use this API to create routing policy by specifying the network instance connection under Lingjun HUB.

CreateSubnet.title: CreateSubnet
CreateSubnet.summary: Users can use this API to create a Lingjun subnet under the Lingjun network segment.

CreateVcc.title: CreateVcc
CreateVcc.summary: You can create a Lingjun connection to connect Lingjun network environment and Alibaba Cloud network environment.

CreateVccGrantRule.title: CreateVccGrantRule
CreateVccGrantRule.summary: Users can use this API to connect Lingjun instance to the Lingjun HUB instance of the target account. After authorization, the target account can be associated with your Lingjun connection by using the authorized Lingjun HUB instance.

CreateVccRouteEntry.title: CreateVccRouteEntry
CreateVccRouteEntry.summary: Create a Lingjun connection route entry.

CreateVpd.title: CreateVpd
CreateVpd.summary: Create a private Lingjun CIDR block. This CIDR block has an independent network environment.

CreateVpdGrantRule.title: CreateVpdGrantRule
CreateVpdGrantRule.summary: Users can use this API to authorize Lingjun HUB instances of the target account. After authorization, the target account can be associated with your Lingjun CIDR block by using the authorized Lingjun HUB instance.

DeleteElasticNetworkInterface.title: DeleteElasticNetworkInterface
DeleteElasticNetworkInterface.summary: Delete Lingjun Elastic Network Interface. After deletion, all relevant data will be lost and cannot be recovered. Please operate with caution.

DeleteEr.title: DeleteEr
DeleteEr.summary: After you delete a Lingjun HUB instance, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DeleteErAttachment.title: DeleteErAttachment
DeleteErAttachment.summary: If you delete a network instance that is connected to an instance, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DeleteErRouteMap.title: DeleteErRouteMap
DeleteErRouteMap.summary: If you delete a routing policy instance, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DeleteSubnet.title: DeleteSubnet
DeleteSubnet.summary: If you delete a Lingjun subnet instance, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DeleteVccGrantRule.title: DeleteVccGrantRule
DeleteVccGrantRule.summary: If you delete a Lingjun HUB cross-account authorization that is connected to Lingjun, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DeleteVccRouteEntry.title: DeleteVccRouteEntry
DeleteVccRouteEntry.summary: Delete a Lingjun connection route entry.

DeleteVpd.title: DeleteVpd
DeleteVpd.summary: After you delete a Lingjun CIDR block, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DeleteVpdGrantRule.title: DeleteVpdGrantRule
DeleteVpdGrantRule.summary: Delete the Lingjun HUB cross-account authorization for a Lingjun CIDR block. After the deletion, the related data is lost and cannot be recovered.

DescribeSlr.title: DescribeSlr
DescribeSlr.summary: Query whether the user has the SLR role-AliyunServiceRoleForEfloVcc required for Lingjun connection.

GetDestinationCidrBlock.title: GetDestinationCidrBlock
GetDestinationCidrBlock.summary: Users can use this API to query the destination CIDR block of the source policy instance when creating a routing strategy.

GetElasticNetworkInterface.title: GetElasticNetworkInterface
GetElasticNetworkInterface.summary: Queries the details of an LENI.

GetErRouteEntry.title: GetErRouteEntry
GetErRouteEntry.summary: Queries the details of Lingjun HUB route entries.

GetErRouteMap.title: GetErRouteMap
GetErRouteMap.summary: query lingjun hub routing policy details.

GetFabricTopology.title: GetFabricTopology
GetFabricTopology.summary: Query the physical topology information of Lingjun network interface controller and Lingjun nodes under VPD.

GetLeniPrivateIpAddress.title: GetLeniPrivateIpAddress
GetLeniPrivateIpAddress.summary: Obtains the details of the secondary private IP address of a specified Lingjun Elastic Network Interface.

GetLniPrivateIpAddress.title: GetLniPrivateIpAddress
GetLniPrivateIpAddress.summary: Obtains the details about the secondary private IP address.

GetNodeInfoForPod.title: GetNodeInfoForPod
GetNodeInfoForPod.summary: Queries the network information of a node.

GetSubnet.title: GetSubnet
GetSubnet.summary: Queries the details of a Lingjun subnet, including the type, CIDR block, instance ID, instance status, and number of NCs.

GetVcc.title: GetVcc
GetVcc.summary: Queries the details of a Lingjun connection, including the specification, Express Connect circuit access port type, instance status, bandwidth, and BGP CIDR block.

GetVccGrantRule.title: GetVccGrantRule
GetVccGrantRule.summary: Queries the details of cross-account resource authorization for a Lingjun connection, including the authorized tenant ID, Lingjun HUB instance ID, and network instance ID.

GetVpd.title: GetVpd
GetVpd.summary: Queries the details of a Lingjun CIDR block, including the status of the Lingjun CIDR block, the CIDR block, the number of subnets and NCs.

GetVpdGrantRule.title: GetVpdGrantRule
GetVpdGrantRule.summary: Queries the details of cross-account resource authorization for a Lingjun CIDR block, including the authorized tenant ID, Lingjun HUB instance ID, and network instance ID.

InitializeVcc.title: InitializeVcc
InitializeVcc.summary: Initialize the Lingjun connection and authorize Intelligent Computing Lingjun to create an SLR in your account.

ListElasticNetworkInterfaces.title: ListElasticNetworkInterfaces
ListElasticNetworkInterfaces.summary: Queries the LENIs that are associated with a Lingjun node.

ListErRouteEntries.title: ListErRouteEntries
ListErRouteEntries.summary: Queries the route entries of the Lingjun HUB.

ListInstancesByNcd.title: ListInstancesByNcd
ListInstancesByNcd.summary: Queries the GPU node list of a specified GPU node whose communication distance does not exceed the specified NCD.

ListLeniPrivateIpAddresses.title: ListLeniPrivateIpAddresses
ListLeniPrivateIpAddresses.summary: Queries the list of secondary private IP addresses of Lingjun Elastic Network Interface.

ListLniPrivateIpAddress.title: ListLniPrivateIpAddress
ListLniPrivateIpAddress.summary: Queries the list of secondary private IP addresses of Lingjun network interface controller.

ListSubnets.title: ListSubnets
ListSubnets.summary: You can call this operation to query the details of one or more Lingjun subnets, including the Lingjun subnet type, network address segment, and instance ID of the Lingjun CIDR block.

ListVccFlowInfos.title: ListVccFlowInfos
ListVccFlowInfos.summary: Queries the traffic rate of a Lingjun connection.

ListVccGrantRules.title: ListVccGrantRules
ListVccGrantRules.summary: Queries the details of a Lingjun connection authorization, including the authorized tenant ID, region, and Lingjun HUB instance information.

ListVccs.title: ListVccs
ListVccs.summary: query the details of one or more lingjun connections, including the specification, Express Connect circuit access port type, instance status, bandwidth, and bgp network segment.

ListVpdGrantRules.title: ListVpdGrantRules
ListVpdGrantRules.summary: Queries the details of one or more route entries in the CIDR block of Lingjun, including the route type, route entry status, destination CIDR block, and instance information of the next route entry.

ListVpdRouteEntries.title: ListVpdRouteEntries
ListVpdRouteEntries.summary: Queries the route entries of the Lingjun CIDR block.

ListVpds.title: ListVpds
ListVpds.summary: Queries the details of one or more Lingjun CIDR blocks, including the status of Lingjun CIDR blocks, Cidr addresses, service CIDR blocks, and Subnet.

QueryInstanceNcd.title: QueryInstanceNcd
QueryInstanceNcd.summary: Query the network communication distance (Network Communication Distance,NCD) between instances (Lingjun node, Lingjun network interface controller).

RetryVcc.title: RetryVcc
RetryVcc.summary: Retry trying to create /delete a Lingjun connection.

SwitchVccConnection.title: SwitchVccConnection
SwitchVccConnection.summary: Switch the VCC connection instance or type

UnAssignPrivateIpAddress.title: UnAssignPrivateIpAddress
UnAssignPrivateIpAddress.summary: Deletes an assigned secondary private IP address.

UnAssociateVpdCidrBlock.title: UnAssociateVpdCidrBlock
UnAssociateVpdCidrBlock.summary: This function can be used to delete the additional network segment of VPD.

UnassignLeniPrivateIpAddress.title: UnassignLeniPrivateIpAddress
UnassignLeniPrivateIpAddress.summary: Delete the assigned secondary private IP address of Lingjun Elastic Network Interface.

UpdateElasticNetworkInterface.title: UpdateElasticNetworkInterface
UpdateElasticNetworkInterface.summary: Update Lingjun Elastic Network Interface information.

UpdateErRouteMap.title: UpdateErRouteMap
UpdateErRouteMap.summary: Update some information about the routing policy, including the description and name of the routing policy.

UpdateLeniPrivateIpAddress.title: UpdateLeniPrivateIpAddress
UpdateLeniPrivateIpAddress.summary: Updated the description of the secondary private network assigned by the Lingjun Elastic Network Interface.

UpdateSubnet.title: UpdateSubnet
UpdateSubnet.summary: Updates some information about a specified subnet instance, including the name of the subnet instance.

UpdateVcc.title: UpdateVcc
UpdateVcc.summary: Updates the information about a Lingjun connection instance, including the peak bandwidth and name of the Lingjun connection instance.

UpdateVpd.title: UpdateVpd
UpdateVpd.summary: Updates the information about the Lingjun CIDR block, including the name of the Lingjun CIDR block.
